name: Finalquest Quest: Final!
description:
No padding, only Final Boss fights and choosing your Ending Slides!

After your long 100 hour or so RPG adventure, you've finally made it to the only points that matter: the final boss fight, and figuring out which ending slides you unlocked. Beat the evil Catstrophomet and bring peace back to Finalquest, so you and your high level friends can finally take on your final quest to return the 6 Crystals, get whatever heroic rewards are left to be earned, see if any of the little secrets you find are actually worth it, and end this dumb game already! Now if you could jut figure out where those Crystals were supposed to go ...
